name: SCHEMATA | Full Demo
description:
Welcome to SCHEMATA

Inspired by RPG hits like OFF, Undertale, Hylics, and Omori, the world of SCHEMATA is full of strange faces, bizarre adventures, and references that make you go "Are they allowed to use this in the game?" (I don't know probably not though).

You are the Protagonist. Your job is to travel throughout the Five Realities and discover what makes the world turn. Encounter strange foes, even stranger allies, and make a name for yourself in your own SCHEMATA!

I hope you enjoy this game, and thank you to all those that have supported me!
